name: progressive-json-monorepo
description: Monorepo for progressive-json and its examples using pnpm workspaces

scripts.dev:demo: pnpm run dev:demo:server & pnpm run dev:demo:client
scripts.publish:progressive-json: cp README.md progressive-json/README.md && cd progressive-json && npm publish
scripts.publish:full: npm run build && lerna version --yes && lerna publish from-git --yes
